info.title: RAAR Radio Archive API
info.description: RAAR Radio Archive API. Some endpoints are public, other are restricted to admins.

http_token.description: API token is passed as HTTP token authentication header: `Authorization: Token token="abc"`

api_token.name: api_token
api_token.description: API token is passed as a query parameter

page_number.name: page[number]
page_number.description: The page number of the list.

page_size.name: page[size]
page_size.description: Maximum number of entries that are returned per page. Defaults to 50, maximum is 500.

sort.name: sort
sort.description: Name of the sort field, optionally prefixed with a `-` for descending order.

get.description: Returns a list of archive formats.

parameters.name: profile_id
parameters.description: ID of the profile this archive format belongs to.

parameters.name: profile_id
parameters.description: ID of the profile this archive format belongs to.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Attributes defining the archive format to create.

parameters.name: profile_id
parameters.description: ID of the profile this archive format belongs to.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the archive format to fetch.

parameters.name: profile_id
parameters.description: ID of the profile this archive format belongs to.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the archive format to update.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Attributes defining the archive format to update.

parameters.name: profile_id
parameters.description: ID of the profile this archive format belongs to.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the archive format to delete.

get.description: Returns a list of available audio encodings.
Returns a list of available audio files for a given broadcast.

parameters.name: broadcast_id
parameters.description: Id of the broadcast to list the audio files for.

get.description: Returns an audio file in the requested format.

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: Four-digit year to get the audio file for.

parameters.name: month
parameters.description: Two-digit month to get the audio file for.

parameters.name: day
parameters.description: Two-digit day to get the audio file for.

parameters.name: hour
parameters.description: Two-digit hour to get the audio file for.

parameters.name: minute
parameters.description: Two-digit minute to get the audio file for.

parameters.name: second
parameters.description: Optional two-digit second to get the audio file for.

parameters.name: playback_format
parameters.description: Name of the playback format to get the audio file for. Use 'best' to get the best available quality.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: File extension of the audio encoding to get the audio file for.

get.description: Searches and returns a list of broadcasts.
Returns a list of broadcasts at the given date/time span.

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: The four-digit year to get the broadcasts for.

parameters.name: month
parameters.description: Optional two-digit month to get the broadcasts for. Requires all preceeding parameters.

parameters.name: day
parameters.description: Optional two-digit day to get the broadcasts for. Requires all preceeding parameters.

parameters.name: hour
parameters.description: Optional two-digit hour to get the broadcasts for. Requires all preceeding parameters.

parameters.name: minute
parameters.description: Optional two-digit minute to get the broadcasts for. Requires all preceeding parameters.

parameters.name: second
parameters.description: Optional two-digit second to get the broadcasts for. Requires all preceeding parameters.

get.description: Returns a list of broadcasts of the given show.

parameters.name: show_id
parameters.description: ID of the show to list the broadcasts for

get.description: Returns a list of downgrade actions.

parameters.name: archive_format_id
parameters.description: ID of the archive format this downgrade actions belongs to.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the downgrade action to delete.

get.description: Get the user object of the currently logged in user.

post.description: Login with username and password. Returns the user object including the api_token for further requests.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the user to login.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The password of the user to login.

get.description: Returns a list of playback formats.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Attributes defining the playback format to create.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the playback format to fetch.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the playback format to update.

put.description: Regenerates the api key of the given user.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user to regenerate the api key for.

codec.description: See audio_encodings for possible values. This attribute may only be set on create.

initial_bitrate.description: See audio_encodings of selected codec for possible values.

initial_channels.description: See audio_encodings of selected codec for possible values.

max_public_bitrate.description: See audio_encodings of selected codec for possible values.

bitrate.description: See audio_encodings of archive_format.codec for possible values.Set to null to entirely delete the files after this many months.

channels.description: See audio_encodings for archive_format.codec for possible values.Set to null to entirely delete the files after this many months.

name.description: Name used in audio URLs, only allows a-z, 0-9 and _.

bitrate.description: See audio_encodings of selected codec for possible values.

channels.description: See audio_encodings of selected codec for possible values.
